244331.「ありがとう ありがとう デスマスターさん。\n これで ようやく 天に昇れます:
Thank you. Thank you, Death Master. Now I can
finally ascend to the heavens...shhhh.

244333.「えへへ～ 仕事してる デスマスターを\n 見てみたくて 追いかけてきちゃった。:
Ehehe~ I had to catch up to see Death Master
at work.

244334.「あ～ でも ひと足 遅かったみたい？\n お弔いは すんじゃったようだけど\n:
Ah~ But I guess I was a little late? I guess
I've already done my mourning, but maybe I'll
do some prayers too.

244335.「見ず知らずの ぼくなんかのために\n ありがとうございます……しくしく。:
Thank you very much for your help to me, a
total stranger............................

244336.「こちらが 見えてないようなので\n 直接 お礼を言えなくて 心苦しい……。\n:
I am sorry that I can't thank you in person since you can't seem to see me... Please forgive me for being so rude as to ascend to
heaven.

244337.「幽霊さん アタシにも感謝してくれたの！？\n 霊界通話機の声は 聞こえたんだけ:
Ghost, did you thank me too? I could hear your
voice on the spirit world caller, but I guess
I can't hear your real voice.

244338.「でも くじけない！ アタシのご先祖サマは\n デスマスターなんだもん。アタシの:
But I am not crushed! My ancestors are death
masters. My psychic powers must still be
sleeping!

244339.「えっ！？ どしたの！\n なんか出てきた？ ひょっとして 幽霊？:
What? What happened? Did something come
out? Is it a ghost, by any chance?

244342.「……変なオバケが アタシに向かって 継承者？: ...a strange apparition towards me, an heir?

244343.「継承 継承……遺産の継承とか？\n じつは アタシには 本当の両親がいて\n:
Inheritance, inheritance, inheritance? I have
real parents, and they're going to leave me a
huge inheritance!

244345.「考えても しゃあないし\n デズ師匠んちに 帰ろっか。:
I can't help thinking about it, so let's go
back to Master Dez's house.

252078.「ハズレ！ ハズレ！\n 継承者ニ アラズ。継承者ニ アラズ。:
Hazure! Hazret! Successor ni Araz. The heirs
ni araz.
